thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 11 of 496
thread.title: Brad

author: Brad
title: Brad
text:
I've been using CLEARBAGS for a number of years. My recent on line order had a ridiculous shipping charge which I planned to contact them about. However, I was contacted by them (before I even had a chance to call), telling me that their website had over charged the shipping amount. Needless to say...that impressed me!! Actually, I have always been impressed by their service whether by phone or their prompt delivery and good packaging of a shipment.
Great product and service!!
